ExportedDefinition.AI_NAME: Download Test Cases From ALM using Test Plan folder name

Sheet.DataFetchScript:
-- Included All test cases from Test Plan folder-- Input the test plan folder name--
SELECT --ALL_LISTS.AL_FATHER_ID /*Test Plan Folder.Parent Folder*/ , -- ALL_LISTS.AL_ITEM_ID /*Test Plan Folder.Item Id*/ , ALL_LISTS.AL_DESCRIPTION as Scenario , TEST.TS_CREATION_DATE /*Test.Creation Date*/ as Creation_Date, TEST.TS_RESPONSIBLE /*Test.Designer*/as Designer , TS_NAME as Test_Name, TS_DESCRIPTION as Test_Description, DS_STEP_NAME as Step_No, DS_DESCRIPTION as Step_Description, DS_EXPECTED as Expected_Results
FROM TEST, DESSTEPS, ALL_LISTS , RUN
where TEST.TS_TEST_ID = DESSTEPS.DS_TEST_ID AND AL_ITEM_ID = TS_SUBJECT AND TS_SUBJECT = ALL_LISTS.AL_ITEM_ID and ALL_LISTS.AL_DESCRIPTION in('CR837 02 Functional Testing') --Provide Test Plan folder name--
--and TS_TEST_ID in (1218,1219) ORDER BY TS_TEST_ID, DESSTEPS.DS_STEP_ORDER
Sheet.RealSql:
-- Included All test cases from Test Plan folder-- Input the test plan folder name--
SELECT --ALL_LISTS.AL_FATHER_ID /*Test Plan Folder.Parent Folder*/ , -- ALL_LISTS.AL_ITEM_ID /*Test Plan Folder.Item Id*/ , ALL_LISTS.AL_DESCRIPTION as Scenario , TEST.TS_CREATION_DATE /*Test.Creation Date*/ as Creation_Date, TEST.TS_RESPONSIBLE /*Test.Designer*/as Designer , TS_NAME as Test_Name, TS_DESCRIPTION as Test_Description, DS_STEP_NAME as Step_No, DS_DESCRIPTION as Step_Description, DS_EXPECTED as Expected_Results
FROM TEST, DESSTEPS, ALL_LISTS , RUN
where TEST.TS_TEST_ID = DESSTEPS.DS_TEST_ID AND AL_ITEM_ID = TS_SUBJECT AND TS_SUBJECT = ALL_LISTS.AL_ITEM_ID and ALL_LISTS.AL_DESCRIPTION in('CR837 02 Functional Testing') --Provide Test Plan folder name--
--and TS_TEST_ID in (1218,1219) ORDER BY TS_TEST_ID, DESSTEPS.DS_STEP_ORDER

PostProcessBuilder.Script: Sub QC_PostProcessing() Dim MainWorksheet As Worksheet ' Make sure your worksheet name matches! Set MainWorksheet = ActiveWorkbook.Worksheets("Query1") Dim DataRange As Range Set DataRange = MainWorksheet.UsedRange ' Now that you have the data in DataRange you can process it. End Sub
